name: Prometheus Escape
description:
The legend of Prometheus tells the story about the bold titan that liked to challenge the powerful Zeus, to the point that he would snatch the fire from humans to take revenge on Prometheus.

But this was not going to look like this, Prometheus quietly sneaked into Olympus and stole the fire from the forge of Hephaestus. Now he has to run away so he can deliver the fire to mortals again, can he do it without being caught in the attempt?

Controls: "Space" and "X".

Developed by the Qinti Games team:
César León: Programming
Mauricio Nuñez: Design and art
Andrés Carbonell:
Music and sound effects
